subject: Beat rising fuel costs during summer travel
body:
CNN.com May Update





Member Center















How to beat rising fuel costs





Despite record fuel prices above $3 per gallon, more Americans will travel by car over the Memorial Day holiday weekend than a year ago. But in an effort to reduce costs, travel agency AAA says travelers are planning to stay closer to home and take shorter trips. Find out what you can do to cut costs for your vacation road trip or for your everyday travel.


Holiday travel likely to rise despite fuel concerns
Debunking gas mileage myths 
Gas budget calculator 





Do you know a hero?




				In a world where the news seems dominated by crime, violence and injustice, CNN honors everyday heroes. CNN Heroes are ordinary people making an extraordinary impact. Do you know someone who has shown selflessness, determination, and courage in the service of others?
Nominate your hero

See other heroes and be inspired by their stories.
				







Bono speaks out on world events




				Dr. Sanjay Gupta talks with Bono about everything from the upcoming G8 summit and the Red campaign, to how he balances his love of music with his passion to "save the world." Watch the interview in its entirety, exclusively, on the "Paging Dr. Gupta" podcast.

Danger: Poisoned food




Dr. Sanjay Gupta and the CNN Special Investigations Unit examine current threats to the nation's food supply that can occur from the fields and farms to the packaging plants and grocery store shelves.

Watch preview
More on contamination in our food supply

Watch "CNN: Special Investigations Unit - Danger: Poisoned Food" on Saturday and Sunday at 8 p.m. ET.
